body: ADMF (no ticker mentioned) issued debt securities with a total principal amount of IDR 2.07 trillion, comprising three series of bonds with varying interest rates and tenors, ranging from 6.75% to 7.05% and 370 days to 60 months. The proceeds from the bond issuance will be used for consumer financing, the company's core business activity, with the public offering period taking place on February 10-11, 2025, and listing on the Indonesia Stock Exchange on February 17, 2025.
title: ADMF Issues Three Series of Bonds Worth IDR 2.07 Trillion for Consumer Financing.
